name: Biblically Accurate Sheeps
description:
You have no choice. 

They are here. 

The sheeps.

The gods.

A boss-rush shooter

In this game it's you and angered gods. Destroy them. Or they will destroy you. This game is a boss rush game where you must dodge a bullet hell.

A game jam game

This game was made in one month for the BOSS RUSH JAM 2023 by Fartfish. The theme of the jam was "MAKESHIFT". The game meets the theme by not having proper weapons, pick anything you find on the ground and throw everything at the bosses! I'm quite happy with this game feature as it makes a good mix with the bullet hell genre since you have to move constantly to pick up items to throw.

Controls

WASD or equivalent to move

Space to jump

Left click to throw an item

Hold right click to charge multiple items, release right click to throw

Escape to quit
